vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Ezbon (H0675), Eri (H6179), Arod (H0720) and Areli (H0692); also called Zephon at Num.26.15;
Another name of tsiph.yon (צִפְיוֹן "Ziphion" H6837)
§ Zephon = "treasure"
a son of Gad and progenitor of the family of Zephonites
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗分 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "財富"
迦得的兒子, 洗分族的祖先(民 26:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
洗分 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "财富"
迦得的儿子, 洗分族的祖先(民 26:15)
